attributes.action: Sociopathic motorists a danger to bikes
attributes.additional_details:
We are calling on the government to withdraw the driving licences of all those showing sociopathic behaviour.

This may be in the form of actual aggressive or careless driving involving a cyclist or written or verbal communication promoting anti cyclist behaviour which demonstrates sociopathic personality disorder.

Anyone demonstrating such behaviour is not mentally stable and therefore is a danger on the roads to themselves and worse, others. You would not issue a shotgun licence to a mentally unstable person.

For this reason licences should be withdrawn until they undergo a course of psychotherapy treatment and are certified mentally stable by a psychiatrist.

Any act that endangers a cyclist shall incur  loss of licence together with a hefty fine and min 6 month prison term as standard.
